sense.def:
To aim a weapon or object at something
pomeni naperiti orožje ali predmet v neki cilj.

seg.quote: Roger picked up a stone, aimed it, and threw it at Henry.
He aimed at the far wall and squeezed the trigger.
He leaned against a tree to steady his aim.

sense.def:
To take aim at someone or something
pomeni z orožjem ali predmetom pokazati na nekoga ali nekaj v pripravljenosti, da bomo streljali ali vrgli tisti predmet.

To aim at something
ali
to aim to do something
pomeni načrtovati ali upati, da bomo dosegli svoj cilj.

seg.quote: We are aiming at a higher production level.
A good solid job is the thing to aim for.

sense.def:
Kadar je dejanje ali načrt
aimed at achieving something
z njim nameravamo nekaj uresničiti.

An aim
je tisto, kar želimo doseči z nekim dejanjem ali načrtom.

seg.quote: It is our aim to set up a workshop.

sense.def:
Kadar je naše dejanje
aimed at a particular person
hočemo z njim vplivati na določeno osebo.

seg.quote: This anti-smoking campaign is mainly aimed at young teenagers.
